title: Maaziah
html: MAAZIAH(Ma·a·ziʹah) [Jehovah Is a Stronghold].1. A descendant of Aaron who was made head of the 24th course of priests in David’s day.—1Ch 24:1, 18.2. One of the priests, or a forefather of one, who attested by seal the “trustworthy arrangement” of Nehemiah’s time.—Ne 9:38; 10:1, 8.
